name: The Seven Wonders of Belobog
desc: If you're reading this, all the incredible things described above will appear around you...

volumes.title: The Seven Wonders of Belobog
volumes.localDesc:
1. There is a place in the city where if you continue walking forward, you will end up in the air.

2. If you repeatedly rock back and forth at the corner of the street, the ground will open up and swallow you into the abyss.

3. At a specific point in time, the people that pass by you will suddenly open their arms and make a T-pose.

4. If you suddenly turn around at a crowded place, the walls will become white.

5. If you utter a certain mysterious phrase, the person you're conversing with will turn into a monster.

6. The heater and trash can on the side of the street become square boxes when it snows.

7. When you're in a place with no one else around, music of an unknown origin could be heard.

8. If you are reading this, all the miraculous things above will happen to you.
